verses.name: 2 Chronicles 25:1
verses.text: Amaziah was twenty and five years old when he began to reign, and he reigned twenty and nine years in Jerusalem. And his mother’s name was Jehoaddan of Jerusalem.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 25:2
verses.text: And he did that which was right in the sight of the Lord, but not with a perfect heart.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 25:3
verses.text: Now it came to pass, when the kingdom was established to him, that he slew his servants that had killed the king his father.
